tool.name: SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.1
tool.description: 02: Pixel by pixel operations with two grids
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT_A False isArrayINPUT_B False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.garden_learn_to_program.1 INPUT_A $INPUT_A INPUT_B $INPUT_B METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT_A
param.label: First input grid
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: INPUT_B
param.label: Second input grid
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-aaigrid, png, x-ogc-envi

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Output
param.help: This will contain your output data of type grid.
